## [760. Find Anagram Mappings (Easy)](https://leetcode.com/problems/find-anagram-mappings "找出变位映射")

### Hints
<details>
<summary>Hint 1</summary>
Create a hashmap so that D[x] = i  whenever B[i] = x.  Then, the answer is [D[x] for x in A].
</details>
